venue.name: Alexander Stadium
venue.description: Located in Perry Barr, just outside of the city centre, the stadium will host Athletics and the Games opening and closing ceremonies.

venue.name: Arena Birmingham
venue.description: Arena Birmingham will host artistic and rhythmic gymnastics. The venue is in the middle of the city centre with excellent public transport links and close to other attractions.

venue.name: Cannock Chase Forest
venue.description: Cannock Chase is a large forest which is part of Forestry England.
